name: @cocalc/next

scripts.dev: npx next telemetry disable && pnpm inventory && next dev
scripts.dev-project: unset PGHOST PGUSER COCALC_ROOT && export PORT=5000 BASE_PATH=/$COCALC_PROJECT_ID/port/5000 && echo https://cocalc.com$BASE_PATH && pnpm inventory &&  pnpm dev
scripts.build-deps: cd ../backend && pnpm build && cd ../util && pnpm build
scripts.build: pnpm build-deps && npx next telemetry disable && rm -rf .next && pnpm build-dist && NODE_OPTIONS='--max_old_space_size=8000' next build
scripts.build-dist: rm -rf dist && pnpm inventory && npx tsc --build tsconfig-dist.json
scripts.build-project: pnpm build-deps && npx next telemetry disable && pnpm build-dist && NODE_OPTIONS='--max_old_space_size=8000' BASE_PATH=/$COCALC_PROJECT_ID/port/5000 next build
scripts.start-project: unset PGHOST PGUSER COCALC_ROOT; export PORT=5000 BASE_PATH=/$COCALC_PROJECT_ID/port/5000; echo https://cocalc.com$BASE_PATH; pnpm start

author: SageMath, Inc.
dependencies-comment: IMPORTANT: we install typescript as a normal dependency (not devDependencies) since it may be needed at runtime due to server settings changing!!
